title: Firms A and B decide whether to advertise

content.prompt: Based on the payoff matrix, which of the following is correct?

choices.label: Firm A always gets a smaller share of the industry profits.
Firm A’s dominant strategy is to advertise.
Firm B’s dominant strategy is not to advertise.
The dominant strategy for both firms is not to advertise.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
